thread.title: The Chicago Cubs and the curse of Murphy
thread.title_full: The Chicago Cubs and the curse of Murphy

author: Noah Frank
title: The Chicago Cubs and the curse of Murphy
text:
Home » News » Sports » MLB » The Chicago Cubs and… The Chicago Cubs and the curse of Murphy By Noah Frank | @NoahFrankWTOP October 20, 2015 2:03 am 
WASHINGTON — Curses are a silly thing that no rational, adult human being should believe to be true. That being said, there is perhaps no curse with as strong an evidentiary chain as the one that haunts the Chicago Cubs. And if that curse had a name, it would be “Murphy.” 
Behold …
